review: I find the Flask Clamp Assembly to be a solid addition to my workshop. The build quality is durable and rugged, which aligns well with my preference for tools that last. The clamp is easy to set up and adjust, making it suitable for various beaker sizes. It holds items securely, which is crucial for experiments. While there are a few reports of quality issues, my experience has been positive, and the price is reasonable for the performance and reliability it offers.
